code:
from chatterbox.util.time import now_at_location

from chatterbox.util.format import pronounce_number

def upRange(start, stop, step):
  while start <= stop:
    yield start
    start += abs(step)

def downRange(start, stop, step):
  while start >= stop:
    yield start
    start -= abs(step)


from chatterbox.builder.skill_builder import SkillBuilder


def create_skill():
  s = SkillBuilder('Track Work Time 01')
  s.get_utterance()
  s.add_keyword("start working", samples = [''' start working ''', "start working", "start working"], action="require", intent_name="intent name12")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' I am starting to track your work time ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("global currentDateTime")
  s.add_code_line("currentDateTime = now_at_location(''' germany ''')")
  s.add_code_line("global currentHour")
  s.add_code_line("currentHour = currentDateTime.hour")
  s.add_code_line("global currentMinute")
  s.add_code_line("currentMinute = currentDateTime.minute")
  s.add_code_line("global timesheet")
  s.add_code_line("timesheet = []")
  s.add_code_line("timesheet.append([currentHour, currentMinute, ''' work '''])")
  s.add_adapt_intent("intent name12")
  s.get_utterance()
  s.add_keyword("im taking a break", samples = [''' i'm taking a break ''', "im taking a break", "i m taking a break"], action="require", intent_name="intent name13")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' I am pausing the time tracking. ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("global currentDateTime")
  s.add_code_line("currentDateTime = now_at_location(''' germany ''')")
  s.add_code_line("global currentHour")
  s.add_code_line("currentHour = currentDateTime.hour")
  s.add_code_line("global currentMinute")
  s.add_code_line("currentMinute = currentDateTime.minute")
  s.add_code_line("timesheet.append([currentHour, currentMinute, ''' break '''])")
  s.add_adapt_intent("intent name13")
  s.get_utterance()
  s.add_keyword("save timesheet", samples = [''' save timesheet ''', "save timesheet", "save timesheet"], action="require", intent_name="intent name14")
  s.add_code_line("self.saveTimesheet()")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' saved your timesheet ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_adapt_intent("intent name14")
  s.get_utterance()
  s.add_keyword("output timesheet", samples = [''' output timesheet ''', "output timesheet", "output timesheet"], action="require", intent_name="intent name15")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak(str(timesheet), wait=True)")
  s.add_adapt_intent("intent name15")
  s.add_code_line("# Describe this function...")
  s.add_code_line("global currentDateTime, timesheet, endTime, currentHour, endTimeHour, currentMinute, endTimeMinute, i, entry")
  s.add_code_line("self.do_pickle(''' someTestName ''',timesheet)")
  s.set_method_with_args(name="saveTimesheet", args={})
  s.get_utterance()
  s.add_keyword("done with work", samples = [''' done with work ''', "done with work", "done with work"], action="require", intent_name="intent name16")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' Stopping the time tracking ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("global endTime")
  s.add_code_line("endTime = now_at_location(''' germany ''')")
  s.add_code_line("global endTimeHour")
  s.add_code_line("endTimeHour = endTime.hour")
  s.add_code_line("global endTimeMinute")
  s.add_code_line("endTimeMinute = endTime.minute")
  s.add_code_line("timesheet.append([currentHour, currentMinute, ''' end '''])")
  s.set_default_stop()
  s.add_code_line("self._in_loop=True")
  s.add_code_line("i_end = float(len(timesheet))")
  s.add_code_line("for i in (1 <= i_end) and upRange(1, i_end, 1) or downRange(1, i_end, 1):")
  s.add_code_line("  if not self._in_loop:")
  s.add_code_line("    return")
  s.add_code_line("  global entry")
  s.add_code_line("  entry = timesheet[int(i - 1)]")
  s.add_code_line("  self.speak(str(entry), wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("  if i == 1:")
  s.add_code_line("    self.speak_dialog(''' todo: skip first entry ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("self._in_loop=False")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' You worked for ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak(str(pronounce_number((endTimeHour - currentHour))), wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' hours and ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak(str(pronounce_number((endTimeMinute - currentMinute))), wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' minutes ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_adapt_intent("intent name16")
  s.get_utterance()
  s.add_keyword("resume work", samples = [''' resume work ''', "resume work", "resume work"], action="require", intent_name="intent name26")
  s.add_code_line("self.speak_dialog(''' I am resuming time tracking. ''', wait=True)")
  s.add_code_line("global currentDateTime")
  s.add_code_line("currentDateTime = now_at_location(''' germany ''')")
  s.add_code_line("global currentHour")
  s.add_code_line("currentHour = currentDateTime.hour")
  s.add_code_line("global currentMinute")
  s.add_code_line("currentMinute = currentDateTime.minute")
  s.add_code_line("timesheet.append([currentHour, currentMinute, ''' work '''])")
  s.add_adapt_intent("intent name26")
  s.build_skill()
